intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: ...Whether these are his true bones or just an effigy, I cannot say. But I know this: we cannot let that monster come back to life.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: We'll stop him, Lucina. I promise. The future can be changed. You've proven it already. And with all of us together, we can turn the course of history.

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: I want to believe that, Father. I want to believe that, more than anything...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: (Psst! Chrom!)

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: (...Trouble?)

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: (I saw armed soldiers hiding in the shadows as we were shown in...)

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: (Then it sounds like we have our answer already...)

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Well met, milord.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Prince Chrom! Welcome.

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: ...I was told you had something you wished to give me.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: My my! No time for courtesy, milord? Such impatience... Do you really want it that badly? This concerns me. The Gemstones and the Fire Emblem can be...treacherous artifacts. A fact Plegia and the Grimleal sadly know all too well...

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: "Sadly"? You speak ill of when the first exalt used them against the fell dragon?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Yes I do, intruder!

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: ...Intruder?

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: You are not supposed to be here. You must be destroyed!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: You wouldn't dare!

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Give me the Fire Emblem... Give it to me!

intro.speaker: Lucina
intro.line: You mad scoundrel! This is a declaration of war!

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: I will only ask one last time: give me the Emblem. Now!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: ...Never.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Then this parley is over. Guards! Seize them!

intro.speaker: Chrom
intro.line: Just as we thought...

intro.speaker: Robin
intro.line: Chrom, this way! Quickly!

intro.speaker: Aversa
intro.line: Robin had an escape route all planned out... How preciously clever of him/her. You should be proud.

intro.speaker: Validar
intro.line: Hmph. If he/she had half the wits of his/her father, he/she would know they've already lost.

cutscene.speaker: Grima
cutscene.line: So ends the human race. The future is built upon the past... But your kind shall never see it.

cutscene.speaker: Grima
cutscene.line: Your mother and father... ...are dead, tiny one.

cutscene.speaker: Grima
cutscene.line: And now it is your turn... to DIE!

battle.speaker: Chrom
battle.line: We have to get out of here now! Cut down anyone who gets in the way!

battle.speaker: Algol
battle.line: Heh heh. Signal the men in hiding, and give these Ylissean scum no quarter!

boss.speaker: Algol
boss.line: Heh heh... Leaving Plegia so soon? No, please, stay awhile. Stay...forever!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Almost there! The exit is just— Wait. Do you feel...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Hnrgh...

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: Run all you like—you can't escape fate. Don't you know that?

end.speaker: Lucina
end.line: Father!

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: The Fire Emblem. Give it freely, or it will be taken.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Just try it!

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: Heh heh... I won't need to do anything... Robin!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Nngh! Ahh...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Robin?

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: Seize the Emblem and bring it to me.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Nngh, no, I... Aarrrgh!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Robin... What are you...doing?!

end.speaker: Validar
end.line: Well done, my child. At last, the Fire Emblem belongs to me. And with my Gemstone, it is complete! Now, to set the Table and perform the rite...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: D-damn you, Validar! Nngh...

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Ah! Nngh...ahh... What have I...done?!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Robin! We must go!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Chrom, I'm sorry! I don't...know what came over me... I'm so sorry!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: I know you are, but right now we need to focus on getting out of here!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: ...Understood.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: What I did... It's...it's unforgivable.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Enough of that, Robin. Save your energy for helping us track him down.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: No, I... You must leave me behind. He could use me again... I can't be trusted! This cursed blood in me must somehow give...my father...dominion over me...

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: But he never had full control... You can fight it, Robin. And if he expects you to blindly obey, that might be the surprise we need.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Chrom, you...you put too much faith in me.

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: Get back on that horse, Robin. You can't give up now!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: But you're not listening! I told you, I'm not—

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: The deed is done. But you can still try to undo the damage. It's not too late!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: All right. I'll...I'll try.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Beg pardon, Robin. Might I have a word?

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: ...Lucina. What is it?

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: It's about my father. I have memories of him, you know. From when I was little. Before he...died.

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: I see...

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: He was courageous, and kind, and everyone spoke fondly of him. People say he was brave right up until the very end. I always yearned to know him better. And now that I do... I can see that the world will be robbed of a very great man. ...I won't allow that to happen.

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: I understand. You love him. ...We all do.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Robin, I... Please, forgive me...

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: Lucina?!

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Stay where you are, Robin! I have no choice. I must kill you.

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: What?! What madness is this?!

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: In my future, you... You are my father's murderer.

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: No! That's insane! Why would I kill Chrom?

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: I was not certain myself, until now... I knew he had been killed by his closest friend. Having witnessed your bond with him, I doubted it could be so... But today's events make it clear. You are at Validar's mercy. I suspect it's he who forces you to take my father's life, and very soon...

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: Lucina, wait.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: If my father is right, then we can change our fates. If this dark future is to be averted, sacrifices must be made. I am sorry, Robin! I know this is murder, I... I know that...

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: Lucina, you don't have to—

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Don't make it harder! Don't resist, and your death will be swift and painless. If you hold any love for Chrom, then let this be done...

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: ...Very well. I forfeit my life.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Godspeed, Robin.

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: Enough!

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: Father, you don't—

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: Lucina, lower your sword...

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: But, Father—

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: LOWER YOUR SWORD!

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: A-all right. ...I can explain.

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: There's no need. You're not the only one who can eavesdrop. I heard every word. Lucina, I know your heart is in the right place... But I trust Robin. You cannot shake my faith in him/her.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: This is not about trust! He'll/She'll be the death of you!

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: Robin and I have held fast through good times and ill... We swore to be two halves of a greater whole. You underestimate the strength of those ties, the bonds we share. I believe in them more than some foretold "destiny."

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: That is easier to say when you haven't seen it yourself...

dialogue.speaker: Chrom
dialogue.line: Lucina, aren't our ties stronger here now than they were in your future? You said so yourself. In this flow of time we are bound tighter than ever, you and I. Not just as father and daughter... But as friends. We can change things—we already have...and we will again.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: ...Very well, Father. I would ask your forgiveness, Robin, but I cannot expect it.

dialogue.speaker: Robin
dialogue.line: I do forgive you, Lucina. You needn't speak of it again.

dialogue.speaker: Lucina
dialogue.line: I pray... That is, I trust the both of you will prove me wrong. And that this future will fall to pieces before your bond ever would.
